name: Color Gallery: Gradient Puzzle
description:
Sequel to our classic puzzle game Color Puzzle, Color Gallery provides you with whole new soothing experience and satisfaction.

Now you can get not only simple gradient puzzles, but also gorgeous mosaic art paintings!

In Color Gallery, every puzzle is a piece of art itself and also part of an elegant mosaic art painting. The game is easy to play, you just need to drag and rearrange colored polygon tiles in hue order. By solving color puzzles, you can challenge your logic and sense of color while enjoying the beautiful mosaic artworks.

If you love classic hue puzzle games, then you must download and try out Color Gallery.

Game Features
* Easy to play: just drag and reorder the colored polygon tiles in hue order
* Offline puzzle game: no need of wifi internet connection
* Whole new game design: hue puzzles are now combined into mosaic art paintings
* High quality puzzle game: simple interface and features, yet still addictive and satisfying
* See if your perception of color is better than the world average record
* Wallpaper-ready screens: download the finished puzzles and set them as your phone's wallpapers, or share them with your friends

This free and offline beautiful color puzzle game now includes more than 100 puzzles (more levels are coming soon!).
Different color schemes and difficulties challenge your color perception.
You can play alone, or share your elegant and beautiful hue puzzles with your friends.
Download now and enjoy the relaxing journey of becoming color master!
